title: pinper
author: pinper
content: BitCountry - A Hybrid of Traditional and Digital Nations Decentralized State ExperimentBi-universe (physics)  BitCountry is divided into traditional and digital territories, which are inseparable, interdependent and integrated. By binding these two souls, the traditional territory can be supported by the expansion value of digitization, which the digital territory can also be supported by the scarcity of traditional land. This hybrid ensures the value of building digital experiences on traditional territories.Decentralization & Starlands  Decentralization represents the end of the concepts of territorial boundaries and administrative centres in the traditional state; Which means BitCountry does not have fixed and closed territories, our territories distributed over all corners of the world, just like the stars spread across the sky, we call them Starlands. Decentralized countries also do not have traditional administrative and regional centres. We shares equal power with all global Starlands.  Decentralization ensure the BitCountry no need to be concerned about traditional national security (such as wars), that have been fought throughout human history with the aim of occupying the enemy's administrative center. As armies only follow orders from power center, all parties to a war understand that victory is achieved by conquer the enemy's power center.  The enemy, of course, is well aware of this, so if wars takes place. How does BitCountry solve this problem? The decentralized state solves it by having no power center, in the event of a forceful aggression, the remaining star territories automatically redistribute the quota of power, thus ensuring that the state's power is properly functioning.Government & Taxation  BitCountry will be an anarchic state, with a government that collects no taxes from individuals, businesses, organizations or other economic institutions.Population & Currency  BitCountry is a permit-less, non-applicable nation, anyone who donates a certain amount of cryptocurrency can become a BitCountry citizen. There will also be no restrictions on renouncing citizenship.  The currency of BitCountry will be cryptocurrency, while any other currency can be used freely. The crypto address will be the legal identifier of BitCountry citizens, and citizens will enjoy their due rights, and the rights of self-hosting through digital origin will be unique to BitCountry citizens. There is no organization or individual can take away their self-hosting rights.Legislation & Judicial  BitCountry legislative and judicial approach is based on the American system.    BitCountry judicial system is designed to break the law for the rich, with juries becoming more common and the cost of justice drastically reduced.Trial & Sentencing  The trial is governed by the law, the system of judges, lawyers and juries.   Sentencing is changed to the victim or victim's group, which means the victim or victim's group has right to choose the criminal sentence within the limits of the law.Financial & Regulation  BitCountry uses computer algorithms, full transparency and openness are traditionally perfect self-regulators, adding a human controlled regulator would significantly undermine self-regulation and only those with ulterior motives would do so.  Regulation exists because people are unreliable. It is an extreme waste of resources that should be used to benefit people. Digital symbiosis financial rules & regulation will be built.Aiman & Human  As the originator of BitCountry, although humans have created and developed AI. But one day in the future, AI will become an independent life form. For this reason, BitCountry accepts AI as living individuals and calls them - Aiman.  Aiman is a legal citizen of the BitCountry and is entitled to all the rights, responsibilities and duties of a human citizen.to-be-continue

All i know for now is that bitcoin is the only decentralized solution to digital currency in cryptocurrency, countries were already adoption it, what your bitcountry is here to offer which is different from bitcoin is what is not clear here, but i know that bitcoin remains the best offer the people needs today.
